title: Ottoman Empire
description: Twin brothers, Johnny and Randy, show you how to make ottomans. Watch as they prove every ottoman tells a story and that family is the greatest footstool of all.
quote: We got ahead by building furniture for your feet.
altHero: rooster brothers Johnny and Randy holding tools
alt1: Johnny and Randy present an ottoman to a displeased Flintheart Glomgold
alt2: Johnny with a bunch of ottomans
alt3: Johnny and Randy carrying a finished ottoman in their shop
alt4: Randy laying on the ground while his father rests his feet on his back, Johnny stands nearby
